*A short story generated by a 15M parameter model running on a Raspberry Pi Zero 2 W.*

One sunny morning, a curiouslittle girl named Lily went for a walk. She saw a big tree and wanted to climb it. She put on her shoes and started to climb.

As she climbed, she saw a small bird with a broken wing. The bird could not fly.
"Hi, bird!" said Lily. "Why are you sad?"
"I can't fly," the bird replied. "My wing is hurt, and I can't fly to play."
Lily wanted to help the bird. She said, "I will find a nice place for you to rest.

This tree is a safe place for you to rest."
Lily put the bird on the tree and put some soft grass on it. Then, she sat on the ground and looked at the bird. The bird was happy and started to feel better.
"Thank you, Lily," said the bird. "You are a good friend."
Lily smiled and felt happy that she could help the bird.
